item.title: My 7-Day HELOC Prep Checklist
item.description: The biggest mistake I made during my first HELOC attempt was assuming I could wing it. The lender asked for CLTV math, I fumbled. They wanted proof of reserves, I rummaged through email. This time around, I built a seven-day prep checklist that aligned calculators, credit steps, and lender communication. By the end of the week I had a shareable packet, a calmer household, and a green light from underwriting. Hereâ€™s the day-by-day breakdown.
